WHO_IS_GOING_TO: Who is going to play today?
YOU_CAN_CHANGE_IT: You can change it in the settings at any time
NAME: Name
WHO_IS_USING_THE_APP_NEXT: Who is using the app next?
IF_YOU_SIGN_OUT_OF_THIS_APP: If you sign out of this app, it will log out all family members on this device
WITH_TANDEM_YOU_WILL_THE_POWER: With Tandem, you'll be able to use the power of AI to bring your child's imagination to life
YOUR_CHILD_CAN_CHOOSE_FROM_A_VARIETY: Your child can choose from a variety of characters, settings, and objects to create their own unique story
AGREE_ON_A_RATING_FOR_THE_STORY: Agree on a rating for the story
BY_USING_OUR_APP_YOU_AGREE: By using our app, you agree to our Terms of Use.
USER_ELIGIBILITY: User Eligibility: 1.1 The App is intended for use by children aged 13 and under. By using the App, you represent that you are a parent or legal guardian and that you have the authority to consent to this Agreement on behalf of your child. If you are under 13, you may use the App only with the consent and supervision of a parent or legal guardian.
I_AGREE_TO_THE_TERMS: I agree to the terms and conditions of the End-User License Agreement.
HAVE_FUN_MAKE_STORIES: Have fun, make stories, read and laugh together. Build brains and happy memories.
ADD_ONE_OF_YOUR_CHILDREN: Add one of your children to get started. Then you can add others and change settings
COMPLETE_A_QUESTIONAIRE: Complete a questionnaire to track your child's development
YOU_CAN_CHANGE_IT_AFTER: You can change it after logging in
YOU_HAVE_CREATED_AND_READ_YOUR_OWN_STORY: You have create and read your own photo
YOUR_PASSWORD_HAS_BEEN_RESET: Your password has been reset successfully
IF_YOU_DELETE_ACCOUNT: If you delete your account you can't get it back
IF_YOU_DELETE_CHILD_ACCOUNT: If you delete Childs account you can't get them back

bookshelf.why-dont-we-one: Why don't we write a story

generate-story.do-you-want-today: do you want to make today?

help-center.as-a-creative-agency: As a creative agency we work with you to develop solutions to address your brand needs. That includes various aspects of brand planning and strategy, marketing and design.
